parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The image contains a COD AEP: 13240004. This is a valid CMF number, indicating that this is electoral propaganda material.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post clearly refers to Petru Farago, identifying him as a candidate for the Chamber of Deputies in position 1 on the ballot for the UDMR party. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, this content is designed to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to promote Petru Farago's candidacy. The visual presentation, including his image and ballot position, directly aims to influence voters to choose him. This clearly fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present information in a journalistic manner. It lacks objectivity and focuses solely on promoting a specific candidate.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express a personal opinion; instead, it's a clear advertisement for a candidate.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1631706347773457</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post is a clear form of electoral propaganda. It meets all the criteria outlined in Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.  It directly refers to a specific candidate (Petru Farago), is used during the electoral campaign period (as evidenced by the CMF number), has a clear electoral objective (to increase votes for Farago), and is disseminated to a wide audience via a paid Facebook advertisement.  There are no journalistic elements present; it's purely promotional. The presence of the CMF number further solidifies its nature as electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>PETRU FARAGO</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>UDMR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
SC KLING CONSULTING SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 1631706347773457) cu conținut electoral, care promovează candidatura lui PETRU FARAGO pentru UDMR la Camera Deputaților, poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot, având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea acestuia. Postarea, identificată prin COD AEP: 13240004, îndeplinește toate criteriile materialului de propagandă electorală conform art. 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334/2006, fiind lipsită de obiectivitate jurnalistică și având ca scop exclusiv promovarea candidatului.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
